data.message: I Love you so much Marshall,you are My favorite artist I listen to you EVERYDAY!!! I am 1 year younger Than Whitney,I know that you will never read this,but I want you to know that I Love you more Than anything in the world, I CAN ALMOST ALL OF YOUR SONGS,I Love you so much,you are My Rolemodel you have a song whit that title,I listen to Campain speech❤️ FUCK DONALD TRUMP, Love you Slim //your biggiest fan ❤️🔥🇸🇪
